com.davidbracewell.cache

Class GuavaLoadingCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.cache.GuavaLoadingCache<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type
    V - the value parameter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCalculatingCache<K,V>, Cache<K,V>, Serializable

    public class GuavaLoadingCache<K,V>
extends Object
implements AutoCalculatingCache<K,V>, Serializable

    Guava-backed loading cache implementation.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
